underlying_goal: Diagnose and fix cloudflared tunnel and SSH access configuration, specifically ensuring proper JWT/Access authentication is enforced
friction_detail: Claude made incorrect claims about token security and open SSH access without verifying, and was corrected by the user multiple times.
brief_summary: User wanted to fix cloudflared/SSH auth config; Claude made several wrong assumptions and was corrected, but the user ultimately got the tunnel working with proper JWT validation.
